description:
Kamala Harris’s plagiarism is "more serious" than it first seemed, a New York Times expert has admitted after he initially downplayed more than a dozen examples of copied paragraphs in her book.

The post Kamala Harris Plagiarism Allegations “More Serious” Than I Thought, Admits New York Times Expert appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Kamala Harris Plagiarism Allegations “More Serious” Than I Thought, Admits New York Times Expert

description:
Female cricket players will only be protected from sharing facilities and competing with "trans" males if they're "good enough", according to a new ECB ruling that has been slammed for letting women down.

The post Female Cricket Players Protected From Competing With “Trans” Males Only if They’re “Good Enough” in ECB Ruling appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Female Cricket Players Protected From Competing With “Trans” Males Only if They’re “Good Enough” in ECB Ruling

description:
A sensational paper in top science journal Nature has found "no change in the warming rate beyond the 1970s", blowing holes in alarmist claims that global temperatures are surging, says Chris Morrison.

The post Scientists Find No Change in Global Warming Rate Since 1970 Despite “Hottest Year Ever” in 2023 appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Scientists Find No Change in Global Warming Rate Since 1970 Despite “Hottest Year Ever” in 2023

description:
Volodymyr Zelensky has suggested that Ukraine would seek nuclear weapons unless it is given NATO membership as it needs a strong deterrent against Russia.

The post Ukraine “Will Seek Nuclear Weapons” if it Cannot Join NATO, Zelensky Says appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Ukraine “Will Seek Nuclear Weapons” if it Cannot Join NATO, Zelensky Says

description:
A new report from the "Energy Crisis Commission" calls for a move way from fossil fuels, somehow missing that this is what's driving the energy crisis, says Ben Pile. That's because the "Commission" is pure Green Blob.

The post The Energy Crisis Commission is Just Another Green Blob Front appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Energy Crisis Commission is Just Another Green Blob Front

description:
The wife of a Tory councillor gets 31 months for a tweet, yet a knife-wielding pro-Palestinian thug, intent on stabbing his political opponents, gets 20 months. And from the same judge! Two Tier justice much?

The post Thirty-One Months for a Tweet? And Labour Says Two-Tier Justice is a “Conspiracy Theory”! appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Thirty-One Months for a Tweet? And Labour Says Two-Tier Justice is a “Conspiracy Theory”!

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
